context.title: Changelog for Rule: Element marked as decorative is not exposed
context.changelog:
[{"date":"2022-11-14T13:50:49Z","message":"Adds consistency to accessibility support and assumptions wording (#1945)

* Adds consistency to accessibility support and assumptions wording

* "No assumptions." -> "There are no assumptions."

* "No accesibility support issues known." -> "There are no accessibility support issues known."

* Excludes deprecated

* Excludes deprecated

* Tries excluding deprecated

* Update _rules/links-with-identical-names-and-context-serve-equivalent-purpose-fd3a94.md

Co-authored-by: Jean-Yves Moyen <jym@siteimprove.com>

* Fixes

* Clean-up and fixes

* Fixes typo in heading

* Tries reverting __deprecated__

Co-authored-by: Jean-Yves Moyen <jym@siteimprove.com>
Co-authored-by: Wilco Fiers <WilcoFiers@users.noreply.github.com>","sha":"c94ee225204c3d20a40ebf2936f9990faa15364a","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/c94ee225204c3d20a40ebf2936f9990faa15364a"},{"date":"2022-01-13T17:17:20Z","message":"elm marked as decorative: Update the examples (#1762)

* elm marked as decorative: Update the examples

As requested by AG on today's survey.

* Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Carlos Duarte <carlosapaduarte@gmail.com>

Co-authored-by: Carlos Duarte <carlosapaduarte@gmail.com>","sha":"543c8df9a391d8224fb0852a71bea757a94afde1","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/543c8df9a391d8224fb0852a71bea757a94afde1"},{"date":"2021-09-16T11:25:47Z","message":"Add "funding" to acknowledgments (#1694)","sha":"07101499299f5871a2fa84cd6295916cd81aa4f1","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/07101499299f5871a2fa84cd6295916cd81aa4f1"},{"date":"2021-09-09T09:09:49Z","message":"Making sure images are displayed- 46ca7f (#1702)

* Making sure images are displayed- 46ca7f

The W3c logo is not displayed at the moment in rule [Element marked as decorative is not exposed](https://act-rules.github.io/rules/46ca7f)

No need for call for Review.

* Update _rules/element-marked-decorative-is-not-exposed-46ca7f.md

Co-authored-by: Trevor R. Bostic <32486143+tbostic32@users.noreply.github.com>

context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"46ca7f","name":"Element marked as decorative is not exposed","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that elements marked as decorative either are not included in the accessibility tree, or have a presentational role.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["Accessibility tree","CSS styling","DOM tree"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Jean-Yves Moyen"],"funding":["WAI-Tools"]},"htmlHintIgnore":["alt-require"]}
